name: Jek_and_Shaeeah_Lawquane%27s_father
content:
The father of Jek and Shaeeah Lawquane was a human male who was the partner of Suu Lawquane and the father of her children.
Around the time of the Separatist Crisis, he met the Twi'lek Suu Lawquane and conceived two children with her. Suu first gave birth to their daughter Shaeeah, and a year later, she gave birth to their son Jek. Eventually, through unknown circumstances, Jek and Shaeeah's father moved out from their mother's life, leaving her with the challenge of raising their children alone.
